response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product to you. This item holds significant value to us, but we understand its worth to you is $12,000. We're willing to bridge the gap and offer it to you for $13,500. This price reflects our commitment to finding a mutually beneficial solution while maximizing our return on investment. We believe this offer presents an excellent opportunity for both parties. Please let us know if you're interested in proceeding with this proposal.", "product_price": 13500}
